caption: This pop rock song features a male voice. This is accompanied by percussion playing a simple beat in common time. A lead guitar with heavy reverb plays a fill in between lines. An acoustic guitar strums chords in the background. A bass plays the root notes of the chords. The mood of this song is romantic. This song is played at a slow tempo. This song can be played in a retro romantic movie.
